attributes.title: So bad 🤡🎃💩🍊🤢
attributes.review: This app is horrible it took 9 months to download and it didn’t let me even open it! It lagged so bad and it had to many ads this app is also spreading false information and it’s in conclusion it’s bad bad bad. Have a good day gen z😘

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It hacked my phone 🤬 ugh don’t download

attributes.title: Mistake
attributes.review: So i downloaded this 𝒜𝓌ℯ𝓈ℴ𝓂ℯ app to show how much i care about the world, but my phone deleted it from my apps as soon it downloaded. I tried again and again and again and again but whatever I did it just got deleted. I tried one last time through my photos app (don’t ask how I did that) and again it got deleted. I followed this app to my trash, and there it was piled deep and deep in the trash on my phone. With it was every fricking download I had of this app. Not only did it have this app it had millions of millions of pictures of racist, disgusting, stupid, ugly, idiotic, people. Now that I look back, the trash had only pictures of one person that was all of those things combined. Donald Trump. Hmmmmmmmmmm... I wonder why. So I exited out of my trash with satisfaction knowing he is exactly where he should be.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app took very long to download and when it did it read all of my information and started to share it online😪.  they told me that i was too black to be on this app so one star!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review:
Just. 

Don’t.

Get. 

Waste of time seriously and also honestly waste of your storage it took way too long to download it and when I opened the app my whole phone crashed and now Everytime I open the app it crashes worst app by far!

attributes.title: Trash 🤢 just trash
attributes.review: As a African American I was trying to download the app to keep up with our President and to see all the dumb stuff he is putting America through but it took the app 2 days to download and then when I try to use it it made my phone get a virus 🦠 so now I have to spend money on a new phone. Thanks trump you really out did your self.

attributes.title: Smh
attributes.review: I hate this app so much it was glitch so much all I want to do is support my husband Obama and help the new pigs in Europe and help all the gays

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: To my fellow Trump supporters, although I do love Donald Trump as president, the app has many problems.  For example this app caused me to die because of Trump’s orange Cheeto complexion.  The enormous amounts of orange on one’s face lead to me having to bleach my eyes, and when that did not work I had to get a spoon and scoop them out.  Again this did not work so I jumped off a cliff to try to get the image out of my head.
